ISSUE.TITLE: Display a warning if multiple plugins try to override the same interface, etc
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This way there won't be any conflicts (issues). For example, if two plugins override the same service

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Added execution of upgrade migration scripts on the startup

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2805 Display a warning if multiple plugins try to override the same service
#2805 Rewritten "Display a warning if multiple plugins try to override the same service" mechanism to use with new IoC
